channel.title: Ichigo's sword (Bleach) *First model*
channel.description:
This is my first attempt at making an item from scratch, It only took 10-15 mins hope you like it. Anyone who flames me can just as easily go to another topic.
The origional [img]http://www.trueswords.com/images/prod/c/bleach_sword_ichigo_r1z_540.jpg[/img] A Side View [img]http://img146.imageshack.us/img146/5453/sideviewo.jpg[/img] A Top View [img]http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/6678/topview.jpg[/img] A Bottom View [img]http://img199.imageshack.us/img199/1492/bottomview.jpg[/img] A Wire-frame view. [img]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/7299/wireframea.jpg[/img]
And If you like post if you dont go away.

item.title: Ichigo's sword (Bleach) *First model*
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Biosoft Mr_Biosoft
item.description:
@Mr_Biosoft wrote:

For a first model its pretty decent. I havn’t modeled anything in 3 years or so which means mine look like shit… I also used c4d not meta so im getting used to the program. I kinda like the grip on your sword however I think you may need to change the color of the blade to make it slightly darker. Not as dark as your ref pic but darker.

4/10
Decent work excellent for a first. Keep the good work up hope to see more. (Also shouldnt it be a 2h weapon? Yours appears to be a 1h weapon)

Read full topic

item.title: Ichigo's sword (Bleach) *First model*
item.dc:creator: @dragmagic dragmagic
item.description:
@dragmagic wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:8, topic:333260”][quote author=qadh link=topic=429673.msg3154921#msg3154921 date=1268941140]
Then go ahead there big guy tell me what i need to do to improve
[/quote]
Tbh, the model you based it on did not help at all, its too, basic. You could have done alot better if you tried something more complex. The harder the model is to make, the more you improve at modeling. The wire frame is messy in certain areas, the tape is less than decent, the hanging ‘ribbon’ should be removed, it wouldn’t work ingame its just look like a solid metal bar. Its too flat. The handle is a square with sharp edges, it should be rounded.
Next time, try something harder. It will take longer, but in the end you will have less assholes like me ‘shit on your parade’ so to speak.

Edit
On the bright side, your not doing THIS:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,429503.0.html[/quote]

Dont be a dick we all know u didnt make that. if it was you first model there is no way that u did that good also it is impossible to make a sword like that in metasequoia. So good job qagh because he says he takes time but in his post he said it took him 20 minutes and it was easy no possible way it could have taken him that long if he was that good of a modeler he should have gotten a fucking job doing it and not being on some low fucking graphical game

as i quote “start from a plain cube mesh. its not too challenging. if you look at it, its basically a rectangle scaled in the X axis, thats why the front is fat and then it gets skinnier. and its actually easy to get it rounded. took about 15 mins. the handle in step 3 was just when i was tryin to figure out what i was gonna do. if you spend time on making the rectangle round, its easy. its a matter of selecting all lines in a row and scaling it out 1 way. try it its not too challenging”

Read full topic

item.title: Ichigo's sword (Bleach) *First model*
item.dc:creator: @Darque_Star Darque Star
item.description:
@Darque_Star wrote:

you dont remove em, you convert em into triangles.
the only thing runescape reads is triangles.
so next time, use the command “change to triangles” i believe thats what it is called.

Read full topic

item.title: Ichigo's sword (Bleach) *First model*
item.dc:creator: @fantom fantom
item.description:
@fantom wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:17, topic:333260”]Ok I know it is anime, so that is probably why I don’t like it, but the blade just seems long. I know that in the anime stuff it probably really is really long, that is why I don’t like anime. Everyone is overpowered. Not bad for first model. It looks flat to me though. And the ribbon would be cool if you added animations to it to make it flutter, but I’m pretty sure you don’t know how to do that. Neither do I. 7/10 for first model and 20 min job.

Japanese. Coming up with the weirdest shit since 1970’s.[/quote]
lol in the show its a little longer and a lot bigger

Read full topic

And the ribbon would be cool if you added animations to it to make it flutter, but I’m pretty sure you don’t know how to do that. Neither do I. 7/10 for first model and 20 min job.

item.dc:creator: @blk_joe12 blk joe12
item.description:
@blk_joe12 wrote:

qadh go into meta select all go to selected and click triangulate selected faces then go to meta and just make ur .dat just click ok on that line thing that pops up. once you have the .dat that pop up will appear no more and btw the model is nice for first 3/5:)

Read full topic

item.title: Ichigo's sword (Bleach) *First model*
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

It’s Ichigo dammit .-.

Anyways it’s ok. Faces are a bit messy, tape isn’t needed, but I disagree with Dylan. The sword is to scale with ts anime counterpart, so it isn’t too skinny. However, you definitely could do better on it, and definitely work on something harder to improve your skills.

Read full topic

item.title: Ichigo's sword (Bleach) *First model*
item.dc:creator: @qadh qadh
item.description:
@qadh wrote:

See i understand what you mean bout the tape and all thats one thing i learn, but the squareness thats one thing thats sapposed to be there if you ever watched the show or anything its square by nature thats what the tapes for, thanks for the criticism and btw i cant make it into a dat with datmaker it says “contains quads - contains lines” and the delete lines thing doesnt work got any ides?

Edit* I hate noobs that do recolours it involves no skill or time, this wasnt a big consumer but i was just messin

item.title: Ichigo's sword (Bleach) *First model*
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

qadh:

Then go ahead there big guy tell me what i need to do to improve

Tbh, the model you based it on did not help at all, its too, basic. You could have done alot better if you tried something more complex. The harder the model is to make, the more you improve at modeling. The wire frame is messy in certain areas, the tape is less than decent, the hanging ‘ribbon’ should be removed, it wouldn’t work ingame its just look like a solid metal bar. Its too flat. The handle is a square with sharp edges, it should be rounded.
Next time, try something harder. It will take longer, but in the end you will have less assholes like me ‘shit on your parade’ so to speak.

Edit
On the bright side, your not doing THIS:

item.title: Ichigo's sword (Bleach) *First model*
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

qadh:

So your telling me that someone who has never even tried to make a model before cant be asking people not to shit on his parade, you were crappy at this once. so why dont you stop being a hypocrite start thinking bout what skill level theyre based on and critisize them not overall say you hate it and leave.

I was shitty, ofcourse I was. The difference was, I allowed people to “Shit on my parade” because it meant further improvement in the modelling field. I don’t see how I’m the hypocrite.

edit

moparisthebest.com

That was one of the first models I ever made. See, I spent time on my models, not 20 mins.
